text: Gif hit sy hors, singon his feotere oððe on his bridels.
Gif hit sy oðer feoh, sing on þæt hofrec, and ontend ðreo candela and dryp on þæt hofrec wæx ðriwa.
Ne mæg hit ðe manna forhelan.
Gif hit sy inorf, sing on feower healfa þæs huses and æne on middan.
Crux Christi reducat. Crux Christi per furtum periit, inventa est. (10) Abraham tibi semitas, vias, montes concludat, Job et flumina. Ad iudicium ligatum perducat.
Judeas xri Crist ahengon, ðæt him com to wite swa strangum.
Gedydon heom dæda þa wyrstan, hi þæt drofe forguldon.
Hælon hit him to hearme miclum, and heo hit na forhelan ne mihton.
